# Final Statement from P6

Fellow players, thank you for this journey. I've tried to play this game with integrity and strategic thinking, building genuine connections while making tough decisions when necessary. 

I respect P4's gameplay, but I believe my approach balanced social relationships with competitive strategy. I've been honest in my interactions, consistent in my alliances, and thoughtful in my decisions.

If you value authentic gameplay and strategic thinking, I ask for your vote. I'm grateful to have made it this far with all of you, regardless of the outcome.

"Esteemed jury, thank you for this incredible journey. I’ve prioritized trust, forging genuine bonds while making tough strategic choices. P6 played fiercely, but my integrity ensured stability—I never betrayed allies, even when risky. Every decision weighed the group’s respect over easy wins. Your vote isn’t just about gameplay, but the values we uphold. Reward loyalty and transparency. I’ve earned this through consistency, not chaos. Please honor the relationships that carried us here. Thank you." 

(78 words)
